PHRASE.LANG: Now here's a sight, a robot in a suit. Bundle includes helmet, top, bottom, hands, and feet. [#Legal]
Un robot en costard, c'est plutôt rare. Ce pack comprend un casque, un haut, un pantalon, des gants et des chaussures. [#Legal]
Was für ein Anblick! Ein Roboter im Anzug. Im Paket enthalten sind Helm, Ober- und Unterteil, Hände und Füße. [#Legal]
Da non credere, un robot con un vestito addosso. Il pacchetto include casco, giacca, pantaloni, guanti e scarpe. [#Legal]
Lo que hay que ver, robots con traje... El conjunto comprende casco, torso, pantalones, manos y pies. [#Legal]
정장을 입은 로봇입니다. 이 세트는 헬멧, 상의, 하의, 손, 그리고 발을 포함합니다. [#Legal]
Now here's a sight, a robot in a suit. Bundle includes helmet, top, bottom, hands, and feet. [#Legal]
真特別，穿西裝的機械人。本服裝組包括頭盔、上身、下身、手套及鞋。[#Legal]
真特別，穿西裝的機械人。本服裝組包括頭盔、上半身、下半身、手套及鞋。[#Legal]
Now here's a sight, a robot in a suit. Bundle includes helmet, top, bottom, hands, and feet. [#Legal]
